description: From Middle English duely, dewly, dulyche, dueliche, duweliche (“rightly, properly”), equivalent to due +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: duly (comparative more duly, superlative most duly)

entries.meaning: In a due, fit, or becoming manner; as it ought to be; properly.
examples: The citizen's concern was duly noted in the meeting minutes.
